Reviews.Title: dont waste your money
Reviews.Author: jennifershells
Reviews.Content: This tablet sucks...doesnot keep internet connection. Sending it back for refund. I got a new samsung tab 2 since then and im loving it. Save your money and get a samsung tab 2. Juz saying..

Reviews.Title: Too expensive
Reviews.Author: Japhia Melissa Jacobo "ChaseMel"
Reviews.Content: For the price you may as well get a higher quality tablet. Overall, the one MAJOR problem is the crappy wifi reception. You essentially have to be sitting next to a wireless router to get a decent speed.  Which makes using this tablet while on the go impossible and frustrating.

Reviews.Title: No issues
Reviews.Author: Christie B.
Reviews.Content: Unlike the previous review, I have not had any issues maintaining a proper WIFI connection on this tablet.  The screen resolution is really nice and clear, and 16GB of storage is more than enough for me.
